articles.author: Georgia Hall, María Paula Mijares Torres
articles.title: Tech Companies Warn H-1B Visa Holders to Avoid Foreign Travel - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: The tech sector and other companies rushed to warn employees with H-1B visas against foreign travel as they responded to the chaos created by President Donald Trump’s move to slap a $100,000 application fee on the widely used program.

articles.author: Jordan  Parker
articles.title: FAA says ‘multiple failures’ in technology caused DFW, Love Field equipment outage - Dallas News
articles.description: Both airports have returned to normal operations, the FAA said.
articles.content: A ground stop and equipment outage that led to the cancellation and delay of hundreds of flights at DFW International and Love Field airports Friday evening was caused by multiple failures of technol… [+3746 chars]
